com.radog.sdk

Class RadogManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.radog.sdk.RadogManager

  • public class RadogManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the beacon device manager. This class lets you perform fundamental beacon tasks, such as initiate device discovery.

    • Method Summary

      Destroy this manager.

      Use this check to determine whether BLE is supported on the device.

      Return true if Bluetooth is currently enabled and ready for use.

      Return true if the manager is started.

      • getRadogManager

      • startMonitoring

        public boolean startMonitoring(IRadogMonitoringListener radogMonitoringListener)
        Starts a scan for Radog devices. Results of the scan are reported using the onScanCallback(Radog device) callback.
        Parameters:
        radogMonitoringListener - the callback Radog scan results are delivered
        Returns:
        true if the scan was started successfully

      • stopMonitoring

        public void stopMonitoring()
        Stops an ongoing Radog device scan.
